title: Collaboration and Blended Learning Strategies for Educational Design in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational elementary curriculum design and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening digital education design competencies applicable to elementary education settings with graduate-level expertise

learning_goals: Learners can develop an instructional design framework incorporating digital security, ethics, and privacy issues.
Learners can design PBL-based social studies projects using collaborative online tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Padlet).
Learners can design assessment rubrics to measure learner engagement in blended learning environments.
Learners can propose three or more situative learning activities to enhance digital literacy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
